"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b8a9636368726e0c040400#post_53b8a9636368726e0c040400

So I just beat story mode with Cerebullum.

So let me get this straight. You beat the Skullgirl, kill Mrs Fortune, Cerebullum returns the Life Gem to the boss, she stretches herself out on her boss's lap in a tight fitting costume, and then looks toward the camera somewhat upset by her action.

I take it everyone likes this game for the battle system and not the groundbreaking writing.

topics.body:
Wow this thread is going by fast.



Anyways I need some input: I want to make a good cosplay for Halloween and the reason why I'm already wanting to work on it is last time I started too late and missed Halloween.

I'm planning on starting next week making it, but I haven't decided which of the two I want to cosplay as.  Should I cosplay as a humanized Amaterasu from Okami's depiction(Yes I'm aware that Amaterasu is a goddes; yes I know that Okami's depiction is basically taking a person and putting them as a animal; yes I know that I'm going xzybit and making a humanized off a video game character based off a religious deity).
So something like this:
!http://fc04.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2011/232/c/7/amaterasu_by_snowchlld-d478xat.jpg!
Or Koishi from Touhou?
!http://38.media.tumblr.com/d6157e99c7667de495147e88bf475059/tumblr_mqkwl7A8Px1ql30auo1_500.jpg!
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
